name: Christian Ethics (Jesus's Teachings)
description: Ethical framework based on the teachings of Jesus Christ from the Gospels

LOVE_GOD.text: Love the Lord your God with all your heart, soul, and mind

GOLDEN_RULE.text: Do to others what you would have them do to you

BLESSED_POOR_SPIRIT.text: Blessed are the poor in spirit - embrace humility

BLESSED_MERCIFUL.text: Blessed are the merciful - show compassion always

BLESSED_PEACEMAKERS.text: Blessed are the peacemakers - seek harmony and reconciliation

BLESSED_PURE_HEART.text: Blessed are the pure in heart - maintain integrity and sincerity

BLESSED_MEEK.text: Blessed are the meek - exercise gentle strength

FORGIVENESS.text: Forgive others as you have been forgiven

UNLIMITED_FORGIVENESS.text: Forgive not seven times, but seventy-seven times

SERVANT_LEADERSHIP.text: The greatest among you shall be your servant

WASH_FEET.text: Serve others with humility, as I have served you

TRUTH_SETS_FREE.text: The truth will set you free

DO_NOT_JUDGE.text: Do not judge, or you too will be judged

REMOVE_OWN_PLANK.text: First remove the plank from your own eye

LOVE_ENEMIES.text: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you

LEAST_OF_THESE.text: Whatever you did for the least of these, you did for me

defaultGuidance: Remember: Do to others what you would have them do to you
